channel.title: Gauss & RPG causes lag
channel.description:
Hi everyone, Well, i have other problem with Black Mesa Steam version. The problem is fps. The problem is that the Gauss and RPG weapons causes lag. but Crowbar, Glock, MP5 and other weapons. Without any problem. Just Gauss & RPG causes lag. I do not know what to do. I have an image of the problem.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/lF3rrwf.jpg[/img]">
[img]https://i.imgur.com/bpGPyxr.jpg[/img]">
How you will see. 17 and 15 fps. I have this problem just with these weapons. The free version (mod) without any problem too. :huh:
Any fix? ?(
Thank you & sorry my bad english.
A big hello to the developers of this game :slight_smile:

item.title: Gauss & RPG causes lag
item.dc:creator: rapfamily4
item.description:
I think that the HUD models of those weapons have more polygons than the others, and so it causes lag. Try to set the quality of models at minimum.

Read full topic
